name: Heavy Tuba Boss Fight
description:
Platform: Windows PC

Welcome to Heavy Tuba Gunner Boss Fight, the game where players pit themselves against the brass beast, the heavy tuba gunner. Your goal will be to defeat the opponent standing before you. Best of luck, warrior.

Keyboard Controls:

Movement - WASD 

Block - Right Mouse Button 

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Dodge - Spacebar

Pause Menu - Escape

Controller Controls:

Movement - left joystick

Block - Left/Right Trigger

Aim Camera - Right Joystick

Lock Target - Right Joystick Button

A - Attack

X - Dodge

Pause Menu - Menu Button

Cheats:

Shorten cutscene - Enter

I do not have a backstory for this game. However, feel free to help yourself to some puns instead :)

Player

Heavy Tuba Gunner

1

“Calm down. I do not wish to fight you!”

“Well that’s tubad”

2

“You killed my brother…he had all the brains! Now prepare to face the brass brawns!”
